welcome_message_body: Welcome to Taxila, Pakistan, a city known for its rich history and archaeological sites. We hope you enjoy exploring the charm and beauty of this ancient city during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Islamabad International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
